title: grievious wounds removed from morellos
body: when mages buy morellos it is for mana refen and therefore removing unnecessary power and moving the passive to void staff which deals with tankier champions would be better. this will allow more power for mana regen in morello

replies.body: The mana regen is being removed anyways
that would be kinda dumb since void staff is a core item so every game will just be constant grievous wounds
